name: @network-contracts/hub-subgraphs
description: Subgraph definitions for the hub contracts

scripts.build: npm run codegen && npm run graphbuild
scripts.deploy-docker-dev: graph deploy streamr-dev/project-registry --version-label v0.0.1 --ipfs http://streamr-dev-ipfs:5001 --node http://streamr-dev-thegraph-node:8020
scripts.deploy-local: graph deploy streamr-dev/project-registry --version-label v0.0.1 --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://localhost:8020
scripts.doAll: npm run build && npm run create-local && npm run deploy-local
scripts.doAll-inside-docker-dev: npm run build && npm run create-docker-dev && npm run deploy-docker-dev
